description: The EDU segment adds detailed educational information to the staff member identified by the STF segment. An EDU segment may optionally follow an STF segment. An EDU segment must always have been preceded by a corresponding STF segment

1.name: Set ID - EDU
1.description: This field contains the number that identifies this transaction. For the first occurrence of the segment, the sequence number shall be one, for the second occurrence, the sequence number shall be two, etc.

2.name: Academic Degree
2.description: This field contains the standard classification awarded upon completion of a unified program of study. HL7 suggests using values in User-defined Table 0360 - Degree.
2.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

3.name: Academic Degree Program Date Range
3.description: This field contains the date range when the academic degree program took place

4.name: Academic Degree Program Participation Date Range
4.description: This field contains the date range during which the staff member participated in the academic degree program

5.name: Academic Degree Granted Date
5.description: This field contains the date the academic degree was granted to the staff member

6.name: School
6.description: This field contains the official name of the academic institution that granted the degree to the Staff Member
6.data_type: XON - Extended Composite Name And Identification Number For Organizations

7.name: School Type Code
7.description: This field contains the categorization of the academic institution that granted the degree to the Staff Member. HL7 suggests using values in User-defined Table 0402 - School type

8.name: School Address
8.description: This field contains the postal address of the academic institution that granted the degree to the Staff Member
